feed.title: Critical Role: season 1
feed.rights: Copyright 2021 Geek and Sundry and/or Critical Role.
feed.subtitle: A bunch of nerdy-ass voice actors[tm] playing TTRPGs

entry.title: Campaign Wrap-Up
entry.summary: Voice actor Matthew Mercer leads a group of fellow voice actors on epic Dungeons & Dragons campaigns. These familiar voices bring the audience into the full experience of D&D, allowing imaginations to soar as the characters embark on adventures. This is Critical Role!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 115 - The Chapter Closes
entry.summary: Victory is celebrated, and all debts are paidâ€¦

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 114 - Vecna, The Ascended
entry.summary: Vox Machina battles Vecna.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 113 - The Final Ascent
entry.summary: Vox Machina, having made their final preparations, make their way to the top of the tower of Entropis. With special guest Joe Manganiello.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 112 - Dark Dealings
entry.summary: Vox Machina search for a powerful artifact that could help swing the tide in their favor. Nothing could possibly go wrong...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 111 - Shadows of Thomara
entry.summary: Vox Machina make their way through the cursed caverns of the undead dwarven city of Thomara, hoping their presence won't be discovered...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 110 - The Climb Within
entry.summary: Vox Machina find treasures, horrors, and mysteries as they make their way through the body of an undead primordial.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 109 - The Ominous March
entry.summary: Live from Gencon: Vox Machina returns to Vasselheim to prepare for the coming of Vecna!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 108 - The Core Anvil
entry.summary: Upon finding the Core Anvil and the forge guardian that protects it, Vox Machina attempt to create the divine trammels that will aid in their fight against Vecna.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 107 - Scaldseat
entry.summary: Vox Machina decend into the heart of an undersea volcano to find the forge of the gods.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 106 - The Endless Atheneeum
entry.summary: Vox Machina race against time to earn the blessing of the Goddess of Knowledge while Vecna continues to gain power. Guest starring Darin De Paul.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 105 - The Fear of Isolation
entry.summary: Vox Machina travel to the pools of Wittebak where they meet a lonely stranger residing in a strange old house... Guest starring Darin De Paul!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 104 - Elysium
entry.summary: We journey to Elysium, where Vox Machina must prove their worth in the eyes of the gods!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 103 - The Fate-Touched
entry.summary: Vox Machina regroup after their devastating defeat at the hands of Vecna, all while Vaxâ€™s soul is tested by the Matron of Ravens.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 102 - Race to the Tower
entry.summary: All hell breaks loose as Vox Machina race to stop the return of Vecna!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 101 - Thar Amphala
entry.summary: Vox Machina journey through the Ziggurat into the Shadowfell, hot on the trail of Delilah Briarwood.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 100 - Unfinished Business
entry.summary: Happy 100th episode! Vox Machina make their way to the mysterious second Ziggurat outside Ank'Harel! With special guest Jon Heder.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 99 - Masquerade
entry.summary: Tary returns to deal with the distinction of his family, and echoes of the past follow Vox Machina to Whitestone.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 98 - The Mines of the Many
entry.summary: To save the Darrington family, Vox Machina descend deep into an abandoned mine.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 97 - Taryon My Wayward Son
entry.summary: Taryâ€™s past catches up with him, as Vox Machina find themselves racing towards the city of Deastok.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 96 - Family Matters
entry.summary: There is a deadly curse upon the Trickfoot name, and it is unlike anything Vox Machina has ever facedâ€¦

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 95 - One Year Later...
entry.summary: Itâ€™s been one year since we last saw Vox Machina, but the gang is getting back together for a group vacation to the Bay of Gifts!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 94 - Jugs and Rods
entry.summary: Vox Machina raise a toast to a bit of well earned quiet. All that's left is for Vex to become mistress of the Grey Hunt...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 93 - Bats Out of Hell
entry.summary: With the dangers of the city of Dis looming, Vox Machina must surmount their dangerous agreement and find their quarry.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 92 - Deals in the Dark
entry.summary: Vox Machina search the city of Dis for any alternative to making a deal with a devil. With guest star Noelle Stevenson.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 91 - Vox Machina Go to Hell
entry.summary: Vox Machina descend into the nine hells, take a walking tour of the city of Dis, and sample the local cuisine.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 90 - Voice of the Tempest
entry.summary: Vox Machina make their way to the home of the Air Ashari for the coronation of Keyleth!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 89 - Curious Tides
entry.summary: Keyleth completes her Aramente as the fate of Vax is decided!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 88 - Tangled Depths
entry.summary: Vox Machina enter the Water Elemental Plane as the final part of Keyleth's Aramente.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 87 - Onward to Vesrah
entry.summary: Adventure on the high seas! Vox Machina prepare to be boarded!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 86 - Daring Days
entry.summary: Vox Machina get to know Taryon Darrington, and prepare for an ocean voyage!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 85 - A Bardâ€™s Lament
entry.summary: Grog vs. Earthbreaker Groon in the Temple of Kord! Scanlan awakes! Vox Machina go to see a guy about a hand!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 84 - Loose Ends
entry.summary: With the Chroma Conclave defeated, Vox Machina begin to pick up the pieces. With special guest Patrick Rothfuss.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 83 - The Deceiverâ€™s Stand
entry.summary: It's Vox Machina Vs. Raishan as the last member of the Chroma Conclave will either stand or fall! With special guest Patrick Rothfuss!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 82 - Deadly Echoes
entry.summary: Vox Machina has made their way to the mysterious island where Raishan is hiding. But the island itself may be an ancient and terrible death trap! With special guest Patrick Rothfuss.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 81 - What Lies Beneath the Surface
entry.summary: The chase is on as Vox Machina search for Raishan and the stolen dragon eggs. Guest starring Patrick Rothfuss!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 80 - Raishan
entry.summary: Teetering at the edge of exhaustion, Vox Machina make a desperate play against the final member of the Chroma Conclave.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 79 - Thordak
entry.summary: Now presenting: Vox Machina vs. Thordak the Cinder King!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 78 - The Seige of Emon
entry.summary: The battle for Emon begins! Vox Machina makes their way toward the ruins of the Cloudtop district!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 77 - Clash at Daxio
entry.summary: Fort Daxio is under siege! Is Vox Machina too late to salvage anything from the battle?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 76 - Brawl in the Arches
entry.summary: Vox Machina are caught in a street brawl against the pit fiend Ghurrix!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 75 - Where the Cards Fall
entry.summary: Vox Machina make their way through the City of Brass searching for the next vestige, but a desperate gamble leads them to making a devil's bargain!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 74 - Path of Brass
entry.summary: Vox Machina begin to assemble their allies at Fort Braxio, and take the opportunity to visit the City of Brass deep in the Fire Plane to retrieve the final vestige!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 73 - The Coming Storm
entry.summary: The countdown to the final battle with Thordak begins as secrets are revealed to the war council, and a possible site for the final encounter is chosen.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 72 - The Elephant in the Room
entry.summary: Vox Machina begin to recuperate, sift through the spoils of battle, and prepare for their return to Whitestone.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 71 - Vorugal
entry.summary: Everything comes to a head as Vox Machina faces off against the white dragon Vourgal and Yenk: A Goristro Demon from the abyss! The battle royale will be joined by friend and foe alike!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 70 - Trust
entry.summary: Vox Machina make a deal with a treacherous foe, and prepare for their confrontation with Vorugal the White Dragon!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 69 - Passed Through Fire
entry.summary: Vox Machina return to Whitestone in a desperate attempt to save Percy, but thereâ€™s far more waiting for them than they bargained for.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 68 - Cloak and Dagger
entry.summary: Vox Machine chase Dr. Ripley across the Island of Glass, but are they prepared for what she has in store?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 67 - The Chase to Glintshore
entry.summary: The chase is on as Vox Machina race towards the Island of Glass in search of a returning adversary!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 66 - A Travelerâ€™s Gamble
entry.summary: Vox Machina request the help of Jâ€™mon Sa Ord in the upcoming battle against the Chroma Conclave. And the whereabouts of Mistress Asharru are finally uncovered. Also Spice.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 65 - The Streets of Ankâ€™harel
entry.summary: Vox Machina make their way to the distant continent of Marquet, traveling into the exotic city of Ank'Harel to seek allies and another vestige of power to aid in their war against the Chroma Conclave...and get slightly distracted.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 64 - The Frigid Doom
entry.summary: Vox Machina go on a secret mission to the decimated city of Draconia, in the hopes of learning more about the Chroma Conclave.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 63 - The Echo Tree
entry.summary: Vox Machina find the root of the pestilence deep within the Shademirk, and come face to face with the creature who holds the next vestige.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 62 - Uninviting Waters
entry.summary: With the Moonbrush behind them, Vox Machina presses on towards the rushing rivers of the Gilded Run that barricade the Shademirk Bog. Battling the enchanted currents, they stumble into a lurking foe whose hunger knows no bounds!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 61 - Denizens of the Moonbrush
entry.summary: As Vox Machina head into the Moonbursh they are drafted into of battle between a pack of Lycans and a Village of Pixies. Also, they make a pit stop at the Last Campsite of Sorudun the Happy. Everything goes well, obviously.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 60 - Heredity and Hats
entry.summary: Welcome to our first live show ever! Vox Machina makes their way into the elven City of Syngorn to complete their pact with Garmili the satyr cartoonist. While there, they make the reacquaintance of the family of Vax and Vex...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 59 - The Feywild
entry.summary: Vox Machina begin their adventure into the mysterious feywild! They quickly run into an old friend, and make a new one...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 58 - A Cycle of Vengeance
entry.summary: The Rakshasa comes to Whitestone looking for vengeance as our heroes prepare for their journey into the Feywild.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 57 - Duskmeadow
entry.summary: The battle weary group return to Vasselheim, as Vax brings himself face to face with the Raven Queen.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 56 - Hope
entry.summary: With Umbrasyl defeated, Vox Machina must now help decide the future of Westrunn. With special guest Patrick Rothfuss!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 55 - Umbrasyl
entry.summary: Vox Machina head up Gatshadow mountain for their final confrontation with the Dragon Umbrasyl. With special guest star Chris Perkins!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 54 - In the Belly of the Beast
entry.summary: Vox Machina put their plan into action, facing down the belligerent and terrifying black dragon Umbrasyl! But plans don't always work as smoothly as the group would hope...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 53 - At Dawn, We Plan!
entry.summary: Vox Machina must decide: Leave Westruun to fight another day, or prepare to face the deadly black dragon Umbrasyl?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 52 - The Kill Box
entry.summary: Grog Vs. Kevdak! Vox Machina Vs. The Herd! It's an all out battle with the fate of Westrunn on the line!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 51 - Test of Pride
entry.summary: Scanlan tries to plan a safe escape for his daughter Kaylie, while Grog makes his way to the center of Westrunn for his final confrontation with his uncle Kevdak.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 50 - Best Laid Plans...
entry.summary: Happy 50th episode everybody! Grog has a sword problem and the group stages an intervention, after which they begin to plan their attack on the Goliaths currently pillaging Westrunn. Everything is going to go great.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 49 - A Name Is Earned
entry.summary: Vox Machina ventures deep beneath the Stormcrest Mountains to confront the mysterious Sphinx, and hopefully learn more about the Vestiges of Divergence.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 48 - Into the Frostweald
entry.summary: Vox Machina continue their quest to collect the vestiges. Along the way they are rejoined by Pike, and discover some other old friends in dire straits.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 47 - The Family Business
entry.summary: Vox Machina return to the city where much of their history began: Westruun. But all is not well! Not only have the Chroma Conclave decimated the city, but another strangely familiar threat has taken hold of the city as well...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 46 - Cindergrove Revisited
entry.summary: Vox Machina joins forces with an eccentric candlemaker to help seal the rift between their world and the fire plane. Guest starring Chris Hardwick. #FeeltheGern

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 45 - Those Who Walk Away
entry.summary: An exhausted Vox Machina spend some time hashing out their pent up frustrations and examining their spoils of victory. They then journey to the Fire Ashari, hoping to find survivors of the red dragons escape from the fire plane.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 44 - The Sunken Tomb
entry.summary: Vox Machina find themselves deep within a lost shrine to the Raven Queen in search of an artifact that may help them defeat the Chroma conclave. But more danger lurks within the shrine than they could possibly be prepared for! With special guests Will Friedle and Mary Elizabeth Mcglynn.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 43 - Return to Vasselheim
entry.summary: Now in the relative safety of Vasselheim, Vox Machina begin planning their first move against the Choma Conclave. Fortunately, some old friends turn up to offer their aid.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 42 - Dangerous Dealings
entry.summary: In the wake of the devastation of Emon, Vox Machina begin making their long term plans to take back the city. But first, they must decide whether or not to make a devil's bargain with the Clasp: a dangerous underground criminal organization.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 41 - In Ruins
entry.summary: Vox Machina searches through the rubble of Emon, hoping to find their allies among the survivors. With special guest Jason Charles Miller!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 40 - Desperate Measures
entry.summary: Desperate to help survivors of the attack, Vox Machina attempt to fend off the assailing beasts, but our heroes are rendered helpless in the face of temptation, infighting and despair.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 39 - Omens
entry.summary: Vox Machina is in disarray as a mysterious skull is found and Vax questions the priorities of the group. Meanwhile, the city of Emon experiences a substantial political shift.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 38 - Echoes of the Past
entry.summary: Vox Machina take some well earned downtime! Scanlan continues his dance with the mysterious gnome girl, and the group agrees to venture back to a mysterious cavern they had abandoned years before...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 37 - A Musicianâ€˜s Nostalgia
entry.summary: Vox Machina return to Emon to prove their innocence. Now on the hunt for the treacherous Riskel Daxio, they must once again face the Clasp, along with some shady characters from Scanlanâ€™s past.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 36 - Winterâ€˜s Crest in Whitestone
entry.summary: It's time for the Winter's Crest festival in Whitestone! Contests, prizes, and revelry abound as we wrap up our year with a nice bow.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 35 - Denoument
entry.summary: Vox Machina fights for Percyâ€™s soul as the Whitestone rebellion comes to a head! All this plus berets, tree hugging andâ€¦ ships?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 34 - Race to the Ziggurat
entry.summary: Vox Machina vs. The Briarwoods: Who will survive? And what terrible secret waits for our heroes beneath Whitestone?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 33 - Reunions
entry.summary: Vox Machina make their way through Whitestone Castle, lead by a new, unlikely ally, in hopes of rescuing Cassandra de Rolo. Battles commence, debts are settled, and secrets revealed as the group descends into the haunted catacombs...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 32 - Against the Tide of Bone
entry.summary: Vox Machina are exhausted, facing an undead army, and preparing to storm Whitestone Castle! Thankfully theyâ€™re about to get some help from an old friendâ€¦

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 31 - Gunpowder Plot
entry.summary: Scanlan finds himself alone, caught in a Briarwood trap! Meanwhile, the party fuels the fire of rebellion, but will the price the town of Whitestone pays be too high? The revolution has begun, and nothing can stop it now!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 30 - Stoke the Flames
entry.summary: The seeds of rebellion begin to take root in Whitestone! But as Vox Machina make their move to bring the population to revolt, they learn that another de Rolo may still be alive...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 29 - Whispers
entry.summary: Vox Machina begin their campaign to sow the seeds of rebellion amongst the people of Whitestone. The cruel Sir. Kerrion Stonefell is the first target on their list, but will the attack against him unleash a darker power?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 28 - The Sun Tree
entry.summary: Vox Machina sneaks their way into the town of Whitestone with the intent of inspiring revolution, but could not be prepared for the horrors that await them insideâ€¦

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 27 - The Path to Whitestone
entry.summary: Greyskull Keep is infiltrated by ghostly attackers as Vox Machina prepares to make their way Northeast to Whitestone to confront the Briarwoods head on.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 26 - Consequences and Cows
entry.summary: Reeling from the aftermath of their battle against the Briarwoods, Vox Machina is called before Sovereign Uriel to answer for their recent destructive behavior.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 25 - Crimson Diplomacy
entry.summary: Vax finds himself alone in the clutches of the villainous Briarwoods! While the team rushes in to save him, they are joined by a mysterious tiefling named Lilith, a powerful wizard who is on the run from vicious bounty hunters. Can Vox Machina save both Vax and Lilith from their violent fates? With special guest player Kit Buss!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 24 - The Feast
entry.summary: Percy reveals the full tale of his blood feud with the Briarwoods, leaving Vox Machina just one week to prepare. While half the team returns to Kraghammer to settle old debts, Vax acquires some new weapons, Percy forges a special surprise, and makeovers are applied to Trinket and Grog.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 23 - The Rematch
entry.summary: As Vox Machina prepares for their return to Emon, Grog demands a rematch against Kern to regain his honor.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 22 - AraMente to Pyrah
entry.summary: Their trials behind them, Vox Machina is brought together within the walls of The Slayer's Take.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 21 - Trial of the Take Pt 4
entry.summary: The three members of Vox Machina and their Slayerâ€™s Take companions make their way down into the tunnels beneath the Velvet Cabaret, pursuing their mercurial prey.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 20 - Trial of the Take Pt 3
entry.summary: Like their companions before them, Keyleth, Vax, and Tiberius make their way to The Slayer's Take. Arriving shortly after their friends' departure for the Vesper Timberlands, the trio are introduced to the rest of their own hunting party, and their mission.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 19 - Trial of the Take Pt 2
entry.summary: Our unlikely collection of travelers press forward into to the frozen, hoary wilds of the Vesper Timberland, closing the last few miles between themselves and their prey.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 18 - Trial of the Take
entry.summary: With the party now split due to requirements of The Slayer's Take, Scanlan, Percy, Vex, and Grog find themselves teaming up with an unlikely duo.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 17 - Hubris
entry.summary: Parting ways with their beloved cleric, Vox Machina is now adrift in a strange and unfamiliar city.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 16 - Enter Vasselheim
entry.summary: As Vox Machina completes their journey across the Ozmit Sea, Tiberius and Scanlan engage in a strange math workshop until Kima arrives and prepares the group for the culture shock awaiting them in Othanzia's capital city of Vasselheim.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 15 - Skyward
entry.summary: The party finishes their necessary purchases within the city of Emon in preparation for their journey.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 14 - Shopping and Shipping
entry.summary: After allowing themselves a single nightâ€™s rest back in the city of Emon, Vox Machina sets out for their meeting with the Sovereign Uriel and the Council of Talâ€™Dorei.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 13 - Escape from the Underdark
entry.summary: Vox Machina find themselves out of the frying pan and into the fryer as the Illithid force makes itself known, and an ally reveals their true intentions. Will Vox Machina manage to escape the Underdark?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 12 - Dungeons & Dragons Campaign Tips
entry.summary: Join Matt Mercer as he walks aspiring GMs through some tips and tricks of the trade, then leads Dan Casey, Ify Nwadiwe, and Zac Eubanks through an entirely improvised one-shot!

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 11 - The Temple Showdown
entry.summary: This time around, Vox Machina finds themselves in dire straits. A tangle with a smelly giant paves the way for their next big test: the assault on Kâ€™varnâ€™s temple. Who will survive this grueling battle?â€‹

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 10 - Kâ€˜Varn Revealed
entry.summary: The team jumps right into a fight with some undead. Vaxâ€™ildan ends up surrounded and takes a few hits getting paralyzed before the team can jump to his aid, but the fight is over almost before it begins once Tiberius gets involved.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 9 - Yugâ€™voril Uncovered
entry.summary: After a showdown with the Duergar Queen, the rescue of a comrade, and an unsettling message from the mysterious evil entity known only as K'varn, the party learns just what can happen when they go looking for trouble...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 8 - Glass and Bone
entry.summary: With two party members turned to stone and another taken captive by the Duergar Queen, the remaining members of Vox Machina struggle to survive. Low on health and options, they flee Emberhold and recoup their losses. But the group hasn't given up, and continue to push through the Underdark, guided by their Ranger Vex'ahlia, finding themselves on track to Pike's mysterious vision...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 7 - The Throne Room
entry.summary: With an uneasy agreement struck between Kima and Clarota, Vox Machina quietly begin a search of Emberhold. Lady Kima means to strike a blow against their unseen enemy by cutting off the head of Kâ€™Varnâ€™s military forces. The party battles their way through the fortress and come face to face with the Duergar King and Queen themselves...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 6 - Breaching the Emberhold
entry.summary: The party continues to wind its way ever downward, far below Kraghammer, making their way toward the Duergar Fortress known as Emberhold. It looms in the dim light of the caverns and many magma flows, housing both secrets...and danger.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 5 - The Trick About Falling
entry.summary: Having successfully slain a dangerous Illithid and its dwarven general, Vox Machina find themselves surrounded by a small army of Duergar. In their attempt to escape, Vox Machina quickly find things moving from bad to worse...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 4 - Attack on the Duergar Warcamp
entry.summary: Now tentatively aligned with the Illithid outcast, Clarota, Vox Machina learns more of the Illithid clan living deep in the mines, and the mysterious being that currently controls them. In order to free the clan, Vox Machina must proceed further into the deep, and reach the center of Clarotaâ€™s hive. But in order for the heroes of Emon to reach the Illithid city in the belly of Khaloor, they must get past the first flayer they encountered, as well as its small army of Duergar...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 3 - Strange Bedfellows
entry.summary: Reeling from the loss of Grog's mind, Vox Machina gather their resources to restore 'intelligence' to their barbarian friend. Contining their journey deeper into the underdark, the group stumble upon Duergar and Illithids, finding danger...and potential allies...at every turn.

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 2 - Into the Greyspine Mines
entry.summary: After Scanlan Shorthalt brought the abomination of a Naga to its tortured end, Vox Machina vowed to Nostoc Greyspine to put an end to the darkness now bubbling up out of the bowls of the earth. The team quickly geared up and made their way into the mine, and began a miles long trek down into the veins of Khaloor. What dangers await them in the Underdark?

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 1 - Arrival at Kraghammer
entry.summary: Our story begins as Vox Machina, the heroes of Emon, arrive at the cavernous underground city of Kraghammer. After wiping out a grave threat to Emonâ€™s emperor, Sovereign Uriel Tal'Dorei III, the band of adventurers has been sent on a journey by the Arcanist, Allura Vysoren, to find Lady Kima of Vord, a Halfling Paladin of Bahamut, who was drawn to Kraghammer upon learning of a great evil resting beneath it...

entry.title: Vox Machina Ep. 0 - The Backstory
entry.summary: Before the adventures begin, enjoy the individual origins of each member of Vox Machina.
